taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [For Nicolaus Joseph von Jacquin, 1727–1817, Austrian botanist]

bio:treatment.discussion: Bonellia, with a total of 22 species, was until recently included in Jacquinia. We follow B. Ståhl and M. Källersjö (2004) in treating them separately here.

references.reference: Ståhl, B. 1995. A synopsis of Jacquinia (Theophrastaceae) in the Antilles and South America. Nordic J. Bot. 15: 493–511.

key_statement.description: Leaves alternate or indistinctly pseudoverticillate, blade 1–4.5 × 0.5–2.5 cm, petiole puberulous-lepidote
Leaves usually distinctly pseudoverticillate, blade 3–8(–12) × 1.5–5 cm, petiole glabrous or sparsely puberulous
